item.title: How Sprint Gives You Simply Everything
item.description:
Major cell phone companies have realized that many people want unlimited talk time without worrying about exceeding their minutes. Sprint takes this a step further by offering a $99.99 monthly plan called “Simply Everything,” which provides limitless usage. As the name suggests, “Simply Everything” truly lives up to its name. For $99.99 per month, users enjoy unlimited talk time. Whether it’s day or night, weekday or weekend, local or long distance, within or outside their home area, all minutes are included without any extra charges...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/how-sprint-gives-you-simply-everything/

item.title: Going Rogue But Not Rouge With Samsung
item.description:
If you’re a go-getter in need of a powerful cell phone that won’t let you down, the Samsung Rogue U960 Black for Verizon Wireless is a top contender among smartphones. Does your current phone offer easy access to social media apps like Facebook and MySpace? How about web browsing, YouTube videos, and photo editing on a bright screen, even in sunlight? Can you stream music wirelessly, get directions, or message easily with a physical QWERTY keyboard?..
